comments: I really like steve, My big problem with this class is that he\'s frankly incomprehensible. He has a pretty thick taiwaneese accent, which isnt made better by the fact that the things he writes on the board are disorganized and messy. Regardless: easy A.

has an accent but speaks clearly...his tests are exactly what he says are gonna be included so as long as you do the practice problems you will be fine. He has a good sense of humor and is easy to talk to...he also drops the lowest out of the two exam scores and that is really helpful cuz the first test is easy!!! good teacher i would recommend him

1) you don\'t understand his English. 2) His teaching is terrible...if you already haven\'t take chem before you\'ll be super confused. 3) his lecture notes are very much scribbled all over the huge black-board. 4)His clarity and helping the students is extremely poor. If you want to get a bad grade take this fool.
